Administrative Manager Job at Future One Africa Network (FOAN Group)




        
    

        
        Future One Africa Network (FOAN Group) - At Future One Africa Network, we envision a world where creativity knows no bounds, connections are limitless, and possibilities are endless. Our mission is to unleash artistic expression, foster connection, and drive social impact, empowering individuals and communities across Africa to thrive.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Manager
Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirments
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Bachelor's Degree.
	5 years of senior admin experience.
	Strong IT & digital workflow skills.
	Proficient in Microsoft 365, Google Workspace, and cloud tools.
	Excellent leadership & communication.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@foangroup.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Job Openings at Dana Group
content:
Dana Group isa major Nigerian conglomerate with a diverse range of businesses spanning manufacturing, aviation, automotive, and pharmaceuticals.It's known for its contributions to Nigeria's industrialization and has diversified into various sectors over its history.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Chief Security Officer

Job Location: Oshodi-Isolo, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We're seeking an experienced Security Supervisor/Chief Security Officer (CSO) to oversee and manage our organization's security operations.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for overseeing the security operations of our organization, ensuring the safety and security of our employees, assets, and premises.


Responsibilities


	Supervise and manage security personnel, including guards and CCTV operators
	Develop and implement security policies, procedures, and protocols
	Conduct risk assessments and security audits to identify vulnerabilities
	Collaborate with law enforcement agencies and other stakeholders as needed
	Monitor CCTV systems and respond to security incidents
	Provide training and guidance to security personnel
	Investigate security breaches and incidents
	Work closely with other departments to ensure a safe and secure working environment.


Qualifications


	HND / BSc Degree in any field
	5 years of experience in a security supervisory role
	Security Related Certifications
	Relevant Training Certificates
	Proximity to Iyana Isolo/Oshodi will be considered
	Strong knowledge of security protocols and procedures
	Excellent communication and leadership skills
	Ability to work independently and make sound judgments
	Relevant security certifications or training (e.g., CCTV operation, first aid).


Application Closing Date: 31st August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs to: vacancies@danagroup.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

2.) Accounts Officer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The successful candidate will be responsible for a variety of accounting tasks, including but not limited to posting general entries, bank reconciliation statements, verifying invoices, payment vouchers, and managing the accounting of fixed assets, depreciation, and provisions.


Responsibilities


	Responsible for payment of cash vouchers and IOU vouchers.
	Accepting settlement vouchers.
	Billing of invoice for customers.
	Posting of invoice manually in Tally.
	Lodgment of cash and cheque to the Bank.
	Making receipt of payment for customer after confirmation.
	Receiving POS payment from customer and generating receipt for the same.
	Ensure all process transactions are in line with accounting procedures and stipulated SOP.
	Carry out any other duty that may be assigned from time to time.
	Ensure proper recording of transactions and other accounting tasks assigned to you.


Requirements


	BSc or HND in Accounting.
	1–3 years of proven experience in accounting roles.
	Time management with proper commitment to work.
	Proficiency in relevant accounting software and Microsoft Office Suite.
	Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
	Attention to detail and accuracy in work.
	A continuous improvement mindset.


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 10th August, 2025

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs to: vacancies@danagroup.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Auto Technician

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Vehicle service and repairs
	Replacement of car parts
	Identification of genuine car spare parts
	Diagnosis and identification of technical faults
	Ensure compliance with safety system and procedures etc


Requirements


	Knowledge of Track Test I, II, III
	At least 3-4 years of workshop experience
	Training certificate from an automobile industry/workshop.


Salary
N100,000 - N120,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 24th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs to: vacancies@danagroup.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

     

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

title: Job Vacancies at SpringRock Group
content:
SpringRock Group is a privately held energy company with main focus in Oil and Gas and Power sectors of the energy domain. We straddle both aisles of the Oil and Gas industry as E&P Operator and Oilfield Service provider.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Business Development Manager

Job Location: Lekki Phase 1, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: E-commerce

Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Develop and implement a long-term business development and marketing strategy for ICT services.
	Lead sales and opportunity management processes for new and existing clients.
	Identify, pursue, and close new business opportunities and strategic partnerships.
	Establish strong relationships with executive-level stakeholders across industries.
	Provide input on pricing, service offerings, and competitive positioning.
	Oversee marketing initiatives, product messaging, and business development tools.
	Lead and coach the Business Development, Sales, and Marketing teams.
	Monitor industry trends and advise management on market developments.
	Contribute to product development strategies in collaboration with R&D and Engineering teams.


Qualifications & Experience


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications in a related field.
	Minimum of 12 years of post-NYSC experience, with at least 8 years in Sales and Business Development.
	Minimum 2 years experience as a Business Development Manager.
	Proven leadership in ICT-related business development.
	Experience in eCommerce will be a strong advantage.
	Strong understanding of marketing principles, competitive analysis, and sales tools.


Key Skills:


	Strategic thinking and business acumen.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and relationship-building skills.
	Strong leadership and team coaching capabilities.
	Proficiency in sales CRM and business development tools.
	Analytical mindset with a drive for results and innovation.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Gold@5Cee.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Prefarably female for gender balance.

 

 

2.) Contract and Procurement Manager (Female)

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Oil & Gas

Key Responsibilities


	Lead contracts, procurement, and logistics teams to support offshore operations.
	Develop SOPs and SCM manuals in line with company and regulatory standards.
	Manage end-to-end tendering, from pre-qualification to contract award.
	Prepare, issue, and oversee contracts and procurement orders.
	Ensure smooth contract execution, claims management, and timely close-outs.
	Implement and monitor KPIs for team performance and process improvements.
	Generate project reports, cost variance analysis, and inventory reconciliations.
	Coordinate regulatory approvals and maintain compliance.
	Support finance with procurement-to-pay (P2P) activities and timely payments.
	Mentor and develop supply chain personnel.
	Perform contractor audits and risk mitigation planning.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s in Engineering, Business, or related field; MBA/PGD preferred.
	Minimum of 15 years of oil & gas experience, 6+ in senior contracts roles.
	Strong negotiation, leadership, and ERP/supply chain systems skills.
	Experience with IOCs is an added advantage.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: Izabelle@5cee.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Group Legal Counsel (Female)

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Energy, Oil & Gas, and International Operations

Key Responsibilities


	Draft, review, and negotiate complex legal and commercial agreements (client contracts, procurement agreements, leases, licenses).
	Provide proactive legal advice and support to management on corporate strategy, risk management, and regulatory matters.
	Oversee compliance with Nigerian laws, international regulations (FCPA, EU Anti-Corruption Action, etc.), and corporate policies.
	Lead the establishment of new legal entities across multiple jurisdictions.
	Manage external counsel engagements, litigation strategy, and control legal costs.
	Supervise, train, and mentor the Legal Department team members.
	Conduct compliance reviews, internal audits, and legal training across the Group.
	Support HR with employment law and employee relations issues.


Qualifications


	Law Degree (LLB or equivalent) and professional legal qualification.
	Member, Nigerian Bar Association (NBA)
	Relevant certifications in compliance or specialized areas of law are a plus.
	Strong leadership, negotiation, and stakeholder management skills.


Experience Requirements:


	Minimum of 10 years of post-qualification experience in a law firm or corporate legal department.
	Strong background in corporate law, contracts, and international compliance
	Proven experience handling cross-border legal matters and setting up entities in multiple jurisdictions.
	Prior experience in the oil and gas industry is an advantage.
	Solid understanding of Nigerian labor laws and international labor legislation.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Gold@5Cee.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Zonal Sales Manager",
  "description": "AAVA Brands Limited, a new generation company of Chanrai Summit Group (Fareast Mercantile Co. Limited), has been proudly serving Nigeria since 1890 and connects world-class brands to the Nigerian consumer, every day. Now under the umbrella of DP World, AAVA Brands Limited is further strengthened as a flexible and agile service provider. Keeping pace with the evolving needs of African consumers, we strive harder to make the right products available at the right place, in the right time.

We have dedicated our resources to supply chain management through the import / manufacture and distribution of products covering branded Food, Beverages and Fast Moving Consumer Goods for the best multi-nationals in the world. A product portfolio spanning 3,500 SKUs is managed by capable, professional teams, robust infrastructure, and strong delivery systems to ensure availability to consumers every day. As a socially responsible group, we have partnered with various NGOs such as the Tulsi Chanrai Foundation to support their social welfare initiatives.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Zonal Sales Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time (on-site)

Responsibilities


	This is a full-time on-site role for a Zonal Sales Manager based in Lagos State, Nigeria.
	The Zonal Sales Manager will be responsible for overseeing sales activities within the designated zone, developing sales strategies, building and maintaining customer relationships, and achieving sales targets.
	The role involves working closely with the distribution network, analyzing market trends, and providing regular sales reports to senior management.
	The Zonal Sales Manager will also be responsible for training and mentoring the sales team to ensure optimal performance.


Requirements


	Bachelor&#39;s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field
	5+ years of experience in the Alcohol beverage is essential.
	Proven experience in sales management, sales strategy development, and customer relationship management
	Strong leadership and team management skills
	Excellent communication and negotiation skills
	Ability to analyze market trends and sales data to make informed decisions
	Proficient in using sales CRM software and Microsoft Office Suite.

Zonal Sales Manager Job at AAVA Brands Limited




        
    

        
        AAVA Brands Limited, a new generation company of Chanrai Summit Group (Fareast Mercantile Co. Limited), has been proudly serving Nigeria since 1890 and connects world-class brands to the Nigerian consumer, every day. Now under the umbrella of DP World, AAVA Brands Limited is further strengthened as a flexible and agile service provider. Keeping pace with the evolving needs of African consumers, we strive harder to make the right products available at the right place, in the right time.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We have dedicated our resources to supply chain management through the import / manufacture and distribution of products covering branded Food, Beverages and Fast Moving Consumer Goods for the best multi-nationals in the world. A product portfolio spanning 3,500 SKUs is managed by capable, professional teams, robust infrastructure, and strong delivery systems to ensure availability to consumers every day. As a socially responsible group, we have partnered with various NGOs such as the Tulsi Chanrai Foundation to support their social welfare initiatives.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Zonal Sales Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time (on-site)

Responsibilities


	This is a full-time on-site role for a Zonal Sales Manager based in Lagos State, Nigeria.
	The Zonal Sales Manager will be responsible for overseeing sales activities within the designated zone, developing sales strategies, building and maintaining customer relationships, and achieving sales targets.
	The role involves working closely with the distribution network, analyzing market trends, and providing regular sales reports to senior management.
	The Zonal Sales Manager will also be responsible for training and mentoring the sales team to ensure optimal performance.


Requirements


	Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field
	5+ years of experience in the Alcohol beverage is essential.
	Proven experience in sales management, sales strategy development, and customer relationship management
	Strong leadership and team management skills
	Excellent communication and negotiation skills
	Ability to analyze market trends and sales data to make informed decisions
	Proficient in using sales CRM software and Microsoft Office Suite.
    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Sales / Marketing Officer (Car Rental Services)",
  "description": "SayWheels Auto is a dynamic electric vehicle (EV) dealership based in Lagos, Nigeria, dedicated to driving the future of clean, sustainable transportation across the country. Specializing in the sale of high-quality electric cars, the company offers a wide range of eco-friendly vehicles designed to meet the needs of modern Nigerian drivers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales / Marketing Officer&nbsp;(Car Rental Services)

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time (Immediate Start)

Key Responsibilities


	Attract new clients and corporate bookings
	Create and execute marketing campaigns (online &amp; offline)
	Manage social media and respond to inquiries
	Follow up on leads and close rental deals
	Maintain client relationships and upsell services
	Meet monthly sales targets


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor&#39;s Degree&nbsp;
	2-3 years of experience in sales, marketing, or car rental is a plus
	Strong communication and negotiation skills
	Social media savvy and able to generate online leads
	Target-driven and self-motivated
	Good record-keeping and follow-up skills


Salary
N200,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;saywheelsautoshr@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Sales / Marketing Officer (Car Rental Services) Job at SayWheels Auto




        
    

        
        SayWheels Auto is a dynamic electric vehicle (EV) dealership based in Lagos, Nigeria, dedicated to driving the future of clean, sustainable transportation across the country. Specializing in the sale of high-quality electric cars, the company offers a wide range of eco-friendly vehicles designed to meet the needs of modern Nigerian drivers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales / Marketing Officer (Car Rental Services)

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time (Immediate Start)

Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Attract new clients and corporate bookings
	Create and execute marketing campaigns (online & offline)
	Manage social media and respond to inquiries
	Follow up on leads and close rental deals
	Maintain client relationships and upsell services
	Meet monthly sales targets


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree 
	2-3 years of experience in sales, marketing, or car rental is a plus
	Strong communication and negotiation skills
	Social media savvy and able to generate online leads
	Target-driven and self-motivated
	Good record-keeping and follow-up skills


Salary
N200,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: saywheelsautoshr@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply
